item.title: Notes: Ebben-2014-Unpacking MOOC scholarly discourse
item.description: References Citekey: @Ebben2014-gz Ebben, M., & Murphy, J. S. (2014). Unpacking MOOC scholarly discourse: a review of nascent MOOC scholarship. Learning, Media and Technology, 39(3), 328–345. Notes Summarize: This paper unpacks the MOOC scholarly discourse, with critical lenses that are terribly needed. It focuses on publications from 2009 – 2013, which features the transitional moment from cMOOCs to xMOOCs. The search results “only” include 15 papers published during that time.
